issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

fields.summary: TiAPI: Review and clean up platform bugs and reduce bug count by 20%.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

Hello,
the mdfind command in the builder.py makes the things very slow, in 1.6.0.RC1 in line 1017 (results = run.run(['mdfind',...)
I waited only once about a half hour, that's a little bit too slow for me xD (my mac isn't the problem, everything else is always fine with the performance, but not this one). Then I changed the whole "cleanup_app_logfiles" function to a comment. Now it works fine for me.

Greetings,
darki777

{html}
fields.summary: The building Process in 1.6.0.RC1 is very slow, if the mdfind command is used..

comments.body:
{html}

This issue has also caused me trouble. It will occasionally take about 45 minutes for an app to build (compared to normally taking only a couple of seconds for the same app). As a temporary fix I have also commented out the cleanup_app_logfiles function.

{html}
